translations: adj.有做……倾向的，易于……的；俯卧的，趴着的；（前臂姿势）手心向下的
v.（尤指面部向下）使俯卧，趴着
n.（Prone）（意、阿根、法、美、巴西）普罗内（人名）

sentences.sentence: He was found lying in a prone position.
These plants are peculiarly prone to disease.
sentences.translation: 这些植物特别容易发生病变。

sentences.sentence: Old people's bones are more prone to fracture.
